```{r}

library(tidyverse)

nba <- data.frame(
  Height = c("5-9", "170cm")
  )

fix_height <- function(h){
  
  if (str_detect(h, "-")) {
    
    fi <- unlist(str_split(h, "-"))
    h <- as.numeric(fi[1])*12 + as.numeric(fi[2])
    
  } else if (str_detect(h, "cm")) {
    
    h <- str_replace(h, "cm", "")
    h <- as.numeric(h)*0.3937
    
  }
  
  return(h)
  
}

fix_height(nba$Height)
```
